item.title: Neil Diamond - Sweet Caroline - Key of C
item.description:
Ukulele play along
Sweet Caroline - Neil Diamond
Using the chords: Am C Dm Em F G G7
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU D DU or D DU DU DU
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: Neil Diamond - Sweet Caroline - Key of C
item.description:
Mainly C, F, G or G7...A little bit of Em, Am, Dm.
Check out the website for the ukulele jam sessions I run via Fredonia Ukulele: https://sites.google.com/a/fredonia.e...
Check out my website for music teachers: https://sites.google.com/a/fredonia.e...
